name: validateContextMenuItem(withCommand:in:userInfo:validationHandler:)
desc: Validates whether a particular contextual menu item should be displayed.
declaration:
optional func validateContextMenuItem(withCommand command: String, 
                                   in page: SFSafariPage, 
                             userInfo: [String : Any]? = nil, 
                    validationHandler: @escaping (Bool, String?) -> Void)
